dimension: 24 1/2 x 34 1/4 in. (62.23 x 87 cm) (plus two 35" ties)
title: Skirt
description: wrap skirt in 3 horizontal sections; narrow waistband and top pleated, 5 1/4\" section in beige; center section of blue and white batik print (8\"); lower band (10\") is lined and heavily embroidered in  pinks, reds, ecru, and purple with appliqued red, black and white tape above and below embroidery
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
